name: Concerto Advisors, Inc.
overview:
Concerto Advisors identifies and acquires innovative and promising technologies from emerging businesses showing great potential in our technology focus areas.

Concerto Advisors leverages its experience and network of industry contacts to shape newly acquired technologies into “next-level” platforms.

Concerto Advisors, Inc. (CAI) is currently working with US Strategic Command (USSTRATCOM) and industry partners to create a transformative paradigm for satellite communications and related services. Concerto Advisors is a technical program manager and is the industry team financial manager and operational integrator for the Internet Routers In Space (IRIS) Joint Capability Technology Demonstration (JCTD) Project. CAI is organizing and arranging financing for an affiliate which will own the IRIS payload located on Intelsat’s IS - 14 satellite after the JCTD testing period has been completed. CAI will then offer services to commercial and government users.
